title: Manikyam and Panna Kempu Haar: Timeless Grandeur Necklace
materials: and high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Intricate filigree pendant with a central ruby accent and emerald detail above. Features alternating CZ stones along the necklace chain. Suspended pearl drops add a touch of elegance. The pendant's design is inspired by classic South Indian temple jewelry motifs.
occasions: and other special occasions. A timeless heirloom for generations to come.
description: This necklace seamlessly blends traditional design with contemporary elegance. The use of high-quality rubies, emeralds, and CZ stones ensures brilliance and lasting value. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a lasting shine, making it a cherished possession for any discerning jewelry collector. The color combination is considered highly auspicious in South Indian traditions.
